title: Nimblex Dictionary
description: Blazing fast C++ dictionary for the Terminal:
• Trie (prefix tree) representation for fast search and autocomplete.
• Fuzzy search using Levenshtein distance with dynamic programming.
• Interactive GUI using ncurses library.

title: Paxos Decentralized Database
description: • Created distributed key-value database in Python with full replication across nodes.
• Used Multi-Paxos algorithm to reach consensus, backed by private blockchain and disk backup to prevent tampering and ensure fault-tolerance.
• Made separate server and client nodes so users can interact with the database without hosting data.

title: Embedded Bluetooth Time Clock
description: • Created STM32-based time clock for employees to:
--- Clock in/out via Bluetooth
--- View employee information and status
--- Calculate payroll
• Developed custom page framework for user interface.
• Utilized the following peripheral devices:
--- Bluetooth module (over UART)
--- LCD display (over SPI)
--- Joystick buttons

title: Pulse
description: • Collaborated on a React + MongoDB live engagement tool in 36 hours, currently utilized by 3 campus organizations and professors.
• Integrated with Heroku for automatic deployment.

title: Secure IoT Processor
description: • Designed and simulated a RISC-V processor using PyRTL (similar to Verilog).
• Devised countermeasures against hardware-level cyberattacks, involving:
--- AN-encoding
--- Internal encryption schemes (RSA / stream ciphers)
--- Triple modular redundancy
--- Error correction codes
• Maintained automated unit tests with PyTest and CircleCI.
• Performed a security and performance audit.

title: Course Scheduler
description: Project description
Led team to create a React-based course scheduler in 36 hours to help students plan for course registration:
• Integrated with UCSB Academics API to provide up-to-date course information.
• Provided quick searching and rearranging, with a calendar view to facilitate conflict resolution.
• Suggested courses based on 20+ university requirements.
• Scraped Rate My Professors to display professor ratings.
